Trigger.name: The Party Call
Trigger.script: local m = multimatches[2] local caller, victim = m[2], m[4] local afflictions = string.split(m[3]:lower(), " and ") -- display(afflictions) -- debug danaeus.feed(caller, victim, afflictions)

regexCodeList.string: (Party):
(\S+) says, "\[DANAEUS\] Afflicting (.+) on (\S+)\."

Trigger.name: Weapon Attack
Trigger.script: local caller, victim = matches[2], matches[3] local affliction = danaeus.callers[caller][victim][1] danaeus.addQueue(victim, affliction) table.remove(danaeus.callers[caller][victim], 1) last_victim = victim last_aff = affliction

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) swings a .+ at (\w+).+with all \w+ might\.$
^(\w+) slashes into (\w+).+with .+\.$
^Lightning-quick, (\w+) jabs (\w+).+with .+\.$
^Lunging forward with long, flashing claws extended, (\w+) tears into (\w+) ruthlessly\.$
^(\w+) lunges at (\w+) with long, flashing claws extended, tearing into .+ ruthlessly\.
^(\w+) rips into (\w+) with \w+ massive, deadly claws\.$
^(\S+) follows up the first attack with another, \w+ dirk piercing the flesh of (\S+)\.$
^(\S+) quickly pricks (\S+) with \w+ dirk\.$
^(\S+) snaps \w+ wrist in a practiced motion, bringing .+ back around to strike at (\S+) a second time\.$
^(\S+) sinks \w+ fangs into (\S+)\'s body\.$

Trigger.name: Belay last! Belay last!
Trigger.script:
local t = danaeus.queue[last_victim] local n = table.index_of(t, last_affliction)
-- display(danaeus.queue) -- debug table.remove(t, n) if #t < 1 then danaeus.queue[last_victim] = nil end -- display(danaeus.queue) -- debug

regexCodeList.string: misses!
The attack rebounds back onto
parries the attack

Trigger.name: Unblockables
Trigger.script: local caller, victim = matches[2], matches[3] local affliction = danaeus.callers[caller][victim][1] danaeus.addQueue(victim, affliction) table.remove(danaeus.callers[caller][victim], 1)

regexCodeList.string: ^(\S+) points an imperious finger at (\S+)\.$
^(\S+) gestures sharply at (\S+)\.$

Trigger.name: One line, two affs
Trigger.script:
local caller, victim = matches[2], matches[3]
local affliction = danaeus.callers[caller][victim][1] danaeus.addQueue(victim, affliction) table.remove(danaeus.callers[caller][victim], 1)
affliction = danaeus.callers[caller][victim][1] danaeus.addQueue(victim, affliction) table.remove(danaeus.callers[caller][victim], 1)

regexCodeList.string: ^(\S+) gestures imperiously at (\S+)\.$

Trigger.name: Prompt - process and hard reset

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) stares about \w+self frenziedly, wild-eyed\.$
^(\w+) is gripped with fear, staring out with terrified eyes\.$
^(\w+) begins to pant in terror\.$
^(\w+) looks about bemusedly\.$
^Horror overcomes (\S+)'s face as \w+ body stiffens into paralysis\.$
^(\S+) stiffens suddenly, \w+ features a masque frozen in agony\.$
^(\S+) shuffles \w+ feet in boredom\.$
^(\S+) lets out a piercing scream, as if wounded by the very sunlight\.$
^(\S+) stiffens suddenly, \w+ features a masque frozen in agony\.$
^(\S+) doubles over, vomiting violently\.$
^The protective coating covering the skin of (\S+) sloughs off\.$
^A sudden deluge of water soaks (\w+), the slightest ripple disturbing the amorphous tranquility of \w+.$
^(\w+) looks suddenly nauseous as \w+ waves a hand in \w+ direction.$
^(\w+) doubles over and hacks up water as \w+ impassively observes\.$
^A layer of sweat abruptly breaks out upon the skin of (\w+)\.$
^The skin of (\w+) takes on a green tinge\.$
^\w+ summons forth a spinning cyclone of water, picking up (\w+) within and repeatedly dashing \w+ against the unforgiving ground\.$
^Blood begins to flow from the pores of (\w+) as ripples flit across the amophous form of \w+.$
^(\w+) sways unsteadily as ripples race across the amorphous surface of \w+\.$
^The skin of (\w+) dries and cracks as \w+ seems somehow more than \w+ was a moment ago\.$
^A ravenous gleam enters the eyes of (\w+)\.$
^With a characteristic Jaziran trill, \w+ sings a qasida of asceticism to (\w+)\.$
^\w+ sings a graceful maqam of el'Jazira at (\w+)\.$
^(\w+) recites an obscure Kamleikan haiku to (\w+).$
^\w+'s poem of gluttony and decay makes (\w+) green in the cheeks\.
^\w+ sings a pastorale of the fields and streams to (\w+)\.$
^\w+ sings an irritating, mind-numbing ditty at (\w+)\.$
^With a mournful cry, \w+ begins the requiem for Seleucar at (\w+)\.$
^With a wink, \w+ recites "Ode to Elixirs" to (\w+)\.$
^You command your humbug to instill a ravenous hunger in (\w+)\.$
^Many somethings writhe beneath the skin of (\w+), and the sickening sound of chewing can be heard\.$
^A bubonis reaches out and strokes the side of (\w+)'s face, and boils form and rupture in an instant as \w+ begins hacking up black fluid\.$
^You command your bloodleech to corrupt the blood of (\w+)\.
^A chimera lets out a concussive roar at (\w+)\.$
^The gremlin races around and between the legs of (\w+), \w+ eyes tracking it as \w+ sways unsteadily\.$
^(\w+) is startled to attention by the roaring of the chimera's lion head\.$
^A lash of energy whips out of the chaos storm to strike (\S+), \w+ face going blank for a brief instant on contact\.$
^\S+ passes \w+ hand in front of \S+. (\S+) trembles and \w+ eyes widen in terror\.$
^(\S+) trembles and \w+ eyes widen in terror. \w+ looks around \w+self as if searching for something that isn't there\.$
